meanings.definition: To redesign or alter a process or system for improved efficiency.
meanings.sent1: I will reengineer the layout of the garden to make it more organized.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to reengineer their production line to increase output.
meanings.sent3: John tried to reengineer the recipe for chocolate chip cookies, but they turned out like pancakes instead.
meanings.sent4: She had to reengineer her daily routine after starting a new job.
meanings.sent5: The engineer had to reengineer the faulty bridge to prevent accidents.

meanings.definition: A person who redesigns or alters a process or system for improved efficiency.
meanings.sent1: The reengineer suggested a new software system to streamline the company's operations.
meanings.sent2: As a reengineer, she was responsible for optimizing the workflow in the office.
meanings.sent3: The reengineer was known for always finding creative solutions to problems.
meanings.sent4: He was a reengineer by profession, constantly seeking ways to enhance productivity.
meanings.sent5: The reengineer's expertise in restructuring systems was highly sought after in the industry.
